languages.text: "Арджента..." {n}Щеки контрабандистки наливаются румянцем.{/n} "Что может быть прекраснее Сестры битвы, озаряющей одним лишь своим присутствием темные уголки таких потерянных душ, как моя? Но увы, увы, остатки разума шепчут мне, что несчастной Джай остается лишь любоваться сиянием этого ангела, не испытывая надежды когда-нибудь коснуться ее крыльев".

"Argenta..." {n}The smuggler blushes.{/n} "What could be more beautiful than the sight of a Sister of Battle, whose mere presence casts light in the dark corners of lost souls such as mine? But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me that poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking any hope of ever touching her wings."
languages.original_text: "Арджента..." {n}Щеки контрабандистки наливаются румянцем.{/n} "Что может быть прекраснее Сестры битвы, озаряющей одним лишь своим присутствием темные уголки таких потерянных душ, как моя? Но увы, увы, остатки разума шепчут мне, что несчастной Джай остается лишь любоваться сиянием этого ангела, не испытывая надежды когда-нибудь коснуться ее крыльев".

traits.locale_text: "Argenta..." {n}The smuggler blushes, her cheeks turning red.{/n} "What can possibly be more beautiful than the sight of a Sister of Battle, whose mere presence casts light in the dark corners of lost souls such as mine? But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me the poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking the hope of ever touching her wings."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me that poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking any hope of ever touching her wings."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “阿洁塔……”{n}婕伊脸红了。{/n}“还有什么人能比战斗修女更加美妙呢？光是她的存在本身，就足以在我迷失灵魂的阴暗角落中洒下明光。但遗憾的是，我仅存的理智告诉我，可怜的婕伊只能欣赏这位天使的光芒，不能抱着任何不切实际的希望，渴望触碰她的翅膀。”
languages.original_text: "Argenta..." {n}The smuggler blushes.{/n} "What could be more beautiful than the sight of a Sister of Battle, whose mere presence casts light in the dark corners of lost souls such as mine? But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me that poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking any hope of ever touching her wings."

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔……”{n}婕伊脸红了。{/n}“还有什么人能比战斗修女更加美妙呢？光是她的存在本身，就足以在我迷失灵魂的阴暗角落中洒下明光。但遗憾的是，我仅存的理智告诉我，可怜的婕伊只能欣赏这位天使的光芒，不能抱着任何不切实际的希望，渴望触碰她的翅膀。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Argenta..." {n}The smuggler blushes.{/n} "What could be more beautiful than the sight of a Sister of Battle, whose mere presence casts light in the dark corners of lost souls such as mine? But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me that poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking any hope of ever touching her wings."

languages.text: «Argenta...». {n}La contrabandista se sonroja.{/n} «¿Qué puede ser más hermoso que ver a una Hermana de Batalla, cuya mera presencia ilumina los oscuros rincones de las almas perdidas como la mía? Por desgracia, lo que me queda de cordura me dice que la pobre Jae solo puede admirar el resplandor del ángel, pues no tiene ninguna esperanza de tocar sus alas».
languages.original_text: "Argenta..." {n}The smuggler blushes.{/n} "What could be more beautiful than the sight of a Sister of Battle, whose mere presence casts light in the dark corners of lost souls such as mine? But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me that poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking any hope of ever touching her wings."

traits.locale_text: «Argenta...». {n}La contrabandista se sonroja.{/n} «¿Qué puede ser más hermoso que ver a una Hermana de Batalla, cuya mera presencia ilumina los oscuros rincones de las almas perdidas como la mía? Por desgracia, lo que me queda de cordura me dice que la pobre Jae solo puede admirar el resplandor del ángel, pues no tiene ninguna esperanza de tocar sus alas».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アルジェンタ…」{n}密輸人は顔を赤らめた。{/n}「バトルシスターの姿ほど美しいものはないだろう。その存在だけで、私のような迷える魂の暗闇を照らしてくれそうなほどだもの。でも、悲しいかな、あたしの正気の残骸は、哀れなジェイはこの天使の輝きに感嘆することしかできず、その翼に触れることも能わぬことを告げているのよ」
languages.original_text: "Argenta..." {n}The smuggler blushes.{/n} "What could be more beautiful than the sight of a Sister of Battle, whose mere presence casts light in the dark corners of lost souls such as mine? But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me that poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking any hope of ever touching her wings."

traits.locale_text: 「アルジェンタ…」{n}密輸人は顔を赤らめた。{/n}「バトルシスターの姿ほど美しいものはないだろう。その存在だけで、私のような迷える魂の暗闇を照らしてくれそうなほどだもの。でも、悲しいかな、あたしの正気の残骸は、哀れなジェイはこの天使の輝きに感嘆することしかできず、その翼に触れることも能わぬことを告げているのよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Argenta ..." {n}Die Schmugglerin errötet.{/n} "Was könnte schöner sein als der Anblick einer Schwester der Schlacht, deren bloße Anwesenheit Licht in die dunkelsten Ecken verlorener Seelen wie der meinen bringt? Doch die letzten Überreste meiner geistigen Gesundheit sagen mir leider, dass die arme Jae den Glanz dieses Engels nur aus der Ferne bewundern kann, nie aber seine Flügel berühren."
languages.original_text: "Argenta..." {n}The smuggler blushes.{/n} "What could be more beautiful than the sight of a Sister of Battle, whose mere presence casts light in the dark corners of lost souls such as mine? But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me that poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking any hope of ever touching her wings."

traits.locale_text: "Argenta ..." {n}Die Schmugglerin errötet.{/n} "Was könnte schöner sein als der Anblick einer Schwester der Schlacht, deren bloße Anwesenheit Licht in die dunkelsten Ecken verlorener Seelen wie der meinen bringt? Doch die letzten Überreste meiner geistigen Gesundheit sagen mir leider, dass die arme Jae den Glanz dieses Engels nur aus der Ferne bewundern kann, nie aber seine Flügel berühren."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}La contrebandière rougit.{/n} « Argenta... Qu'y a-t-il de plus beau qu'une Sœur de Bataille, dont la simple présence illumine les recoins obscurs des âmes égarées comme la mienne ? Malheureusement, les vestiges de ma raison me disent que la pauvre Jae ne peut qu'admirer la brillance de cet ange et doit abandonner tout espoir de toucher un jour ses ailes. »
languages.original_text: "Argenta..." {n}The smuggler blushes.{/n} "What could be more beautiful than the sight of a Sister of Battle, whose mere presence casts light in the dark corners of lost souls such as mine? But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me that poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking any hope of ever touching her wings."

traits.locale_text: {n}La contrebandière rougit.{/n} « Argenta... Qu'y a-t-il de plus beau qu'une Sœur de Bataille, dont la simple présence illumine les recoins obscurs des âmes égarées comme la mienne ? Malheureusement, les vestiges de ma raison me disent que la pauvre Jae ne peut qu'admirer la brillance de cet ange et doit abandonner tout espoir de toucher un jour ses ailes. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Argenta." {n}Kaçakçının yanakları kızarıyor.{/n} "Sırf varlığıyla benimki gibi kayıp ruhların en karanlık çukurlarına ışık saçan bir Harp Rahibesi'nden daha güzel ne olabilir? Sağduyumdan kalanlarsa zavallı Jae'ın bu meleğin aydınlığına yalnızca hayranlık besleyebileceğini söylüyor. Kanatlarına dokunmaya dair en ufak bir umudum olamaz."
languages.original_text: "Argenta..." {n}The smuggler blushes.{/n} "What could be more beautiful than the sight of a Sister of Battle, whose mere presence casts light in the dark corners of lost souls such as mine? But alas, what remains of my sanity is telling me that poor Jae can only admire the radiance of this angel, forsaking any hope of ever touching her wings."

traits.locale_text: "Argenta." {n}Kaçakçının yanakları kızarıyor.{/n} "Sırf varlığı bile benim ruhum gibi kayıp ruhların en karanlık köşelerine ışık saçan bir Harp Rahibesi kadar güzel ne olabilir ki? Sağduyumdan arta kalanlar ama, zavallı Jae'ın bu meleğin aydınlığına yalnızca hayranlık besleyebileceğini söylüyor. Kanatlarına dokunabileceğime dair herhangi bir umudum olamaz."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
